nodes.text: A female individual was the great-grandmother of the Latero pilot Greez Dritus. She passed away long before 14 BBY, when Dritus was reminded of her while speaking about cooking with his friends Cal Kestis and Cere Junda on the planet Kashyyyk. He remembered her fondly and described her as the only real family he had ever had. While the crew was traveling aboard the Mantis, Dritus would often call back to her recipes and their relationship.
Greez Dritus's great-grandmother was first mentioned in the 2019 video game Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order.
